name: PickaRestaurant
0:
”Alexa, ask Restaurant Decider where can I eat”
”What type of restaurant do you recommend”
”What are our options”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: restaurant decider
des: Feeling indecisive about what to eat? Use Restaurant Decider to recommend some food from a random array of restaurant cuisine types. From Chinese to Pizza to Mexican food, the Restaurant Decider can give a wide variety of possible restaurants. Just ask: "where should I eat?" and Restaurant Decider will pick a restaurant type for you until you're satisfied!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
